actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests, California, as the Sheep-Mountain Wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests in California as the Sheep Mountain Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests, California, as the Sheep-Mountain Wilderness.
